title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM
descriptions:
Product Name: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch

Experience unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch. This watch harnesses solar energy, requiring just 3 hours per day in 50,000 lux to provide unlimited power in smartwatch mode and up to 48 hours in GPS mode.

The Surf-Edition is packed with features tailored for surfers, including a wave counter, max speed tracking, distance tracking, and tide data. For windsurfers and kiteboarders, the watch offers GPS position tracking, speed and distance measurement, heart rate monitoring, and elevation data for jumps.

This watch is compatible with Surfline Sessions, smart notifications, and Connect IQ. It comes with preloaded activity profiles for running, biking, swimming, and strength training. For navigation, it features a 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and access to GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo satellite systems.

The Instinct 2 Solar also offers comprehensive health monitoring, including heart rate, sleep tracking, Pulse Ox, respiration tracking, and stress tracking. The watch is water-rated to 100 meters, thermally and shock-resistant, and built with a fiber-reinforced polymer case and scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass.

Unfortunately, this model does not support Garmin Pay. However, it does offer unmatched durability, functionality, and solar charging capabilities, making it an ideal choice for outdoor enthusiasts. The watch comes in a 45 MM size.
